features: Metal Panel Keyboard--Our gaming keyboard is designed with an Aluminum alloy panel. Cool brushed metal panel not only enhances the texture of the keyboard but also extremely improves the durability of the whole keyboard. This light up keyboard has a water-resistant function, you don't have to worry about spilled liquids damaging it.

Soft & Responsive Keys--All keys are very soft to touch and offer very precise keystrokes, ideal for work or gaming. Our white gaming keyboard has a lifespan of 10,000,000 clicks. The double-colored injection keycaps offer crystal clear uniform backlighting and the letters will never fade away.

Cool Rainbow Backlight Keyboard--The colorful keyboard has a 7-color rainbow LED backlight, and each key is colored brightly, so you can type and play games even in a dark environment without difficulty, and the soft light won’t hurt your eyes. You can adjust the brightness and breathing speed of the backlit according to your preference. Let you immerse the game world in a cool atmosphere (Note: The light is not RGB, the color of light cannot be changed).

Ergonomic Design--The scientific stair-step keycap design makes it easy for the finger to reach all keys, maximizing the comfort of your hand to meet the needs of a long-time game or work. 25 keys Anti-ghosting technology allows you to use more combinations to win a game. 12 combinations of multimedia keys facilitate the operation of your work or game and improve efficiency.

Strong Compatibility & Quality Assurance== LANGTU USB wired keyboard meets the need of gamers, typists, programmers, writers, and combines your office and gaming experience. No driver needed, Plug-and-Play. Support Windows 2000 / 10/8/7 / ME / XP / VISTA, MAC, Linus. If there is any product problem under normal use, please feel free to contact us, we will provide the best solution for you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Question & Answer 1. Is it quiet keyboard? It is membrane keyboard,which is much more quiet than mechanical keyboard. 2. Is it compatible with Apple system? Compatible with mac system, but the shortcut key combination(select all, copy, paste, etc..) is not applicable. 3. Is the light RGB? Lights are not RGB. The keyboard light color cannot be changed. 4.Does the lighting on the keyboard go through the letters? Yes it does. 5.Is it compatible with Xbox/PS4/PS5? Yes it is.But you'll need to buy another convertor to connect the keyboard to your device.

Soft and Responsive Keys All keys are soft to touch and offer very precise keystrokes. The keys have a 10 000 000 keystrokes lifetime. ABS keycaps adopt two-color injection molding process offer crystal clear uniform backlight. No matter how long you use it, the letter of characters never fade. Wide Compatibility This Keyboard Compatible with Windows 2000/2003/XP/Vista/ Win7/Win8/Win10 operating systems and Mac OS, which is perfect for game or daily use. No driver needed, Plug-and-Play. Water-resistant Function It has a water-resistant function, you don't have to worry about spilled liquids that will damage the computer keyboard.

Cool Rainbow Backlight Gaming Keyboard This light up keyboard has 7-color rainbow LED backlight. (Note: The light is not RGB, the color of light cannot be changed). There are 2 light-up modes and 5 levels of brightness for choice. You can adjust the brightness and breathing speed of the backlit and just turn off the light according to your preference. Lighting Mode: 5-level brightness FN+PGUP = Increase brightness FN+PGDN = Reduce brightness Breathing Mode: 10-level breathing speed FN+PGUP = Increase breathing speed FN+PGDN = Reduce breathing speed FN+Application key=Turn ON/OFF the backlight Each key is colored brightly but softly, and you can also see the rainbow lights from the side of the keyboard. You can type and play games even in a dark environment without difficulty, and the soft light won’t hurt your eyes,so that you can freely enjoy your gaming time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I can't believe how cheap this was
reviews.reviewText: Because it certainly doesn't feel or look cheap. It looks higher end than it is.I've been using it for a little while, before deciding to write a review, and I love it just as much now as when I first got it. The keys are clacky, in a pleasing textile-ish kind of way, if you like that, but also not obnoxiously loud at the same time. I did notice the space bar is a bit springier sounding than the other keys like others have said, but I honestly don't even think about it when I'm using it anymore. The contrast of the white keys against the stainless is very aesthetically pleasing. I wish it had dedicated volume buttons, but I'll live. Because the keys are raised, I find it very easy to dust when cleaning--it even includes a cleaning brush to get between the keys, which I thought was a nice touch. The different light modes are fun, though I usually just keep them stationary. It just makes my work area a little more playful, and I love that because it's so me. I don't know much about gaming keyboards or what actually makes a keyboard a **gaming** keyboard, so maybe those who are more hardcore might be able to pick it apart. But I bet a kid would absolutely love this. I'm 38 and I sure do!Edit: I just sat down at my desk and realized I've been using this keyboard more than 6 months now, so I thought I'd come back to update. I still love it! It's really easy to type with, not a difficult adjustment going from my work computer to home. The clack of the keys is very satisfying for me. All the keys still work great and no letters have even begun to wear down. It cleans up really easy with a duster as well. I hope it continues to hold up so well, but honestly, even if it stopped working tomorrow, I'd probably still order it again because I like it so much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Perfectly for Mac!
reviews.reviewText: I had a Logitech wireless keyboard for years and it finally started to fail me. It was an efficient little keyboard but I never took advantage of the wireless-ness. I use the keyboard strictly for work - I'm never sitting on my couch with a keyboard in my lap.I received this keyboard last night (1-day shipping, super fast) and after a morning working on the keyboard, I knew I needed to leave a review immediately.Aesthetically the keyboard is gorgeous. The silver panel is really sleek and modern and plays well with the reflection of the colored lights. I thought about making my own little video but really, what's the point? It looks exactly as it does in the photos as it does in person. As others have said, the keys make a nice satisfying click (I much prefer a mechanical -click- over the taps of the new flat Mac keyboards) but is not excessively loud. I also like that the keys are not printed but cut outs in the key cap which makes me believe there will be no room for smudging letters or discoloration.Initially I was a little disappointed when I realized that there were no multimedia functions on this keyboard, I used the volume control/mute buttons on the Logitech daily. After perusing this page I realized there are multimedia controls but they do not work with Mac. HOWEVER, as the copy/paste functions and other standard Mac functions DO work on this keyboard, I of course gave it a try. I'm happy to report that the FN+F2 and F3 control the volume. From what I can tell, this keyboard works as well as any other Mac keyboard.From what I can tell, there are only a couple of small issues here:1. The keys are spread slightly further apart than a normal keyboard so they take a tiny bit of getting used to. I am an advanced typist and have had only the smallest learning curve in terms of getting used to it.2. The spacebar is making a very small squeaking noise when tapped in a certain space. This might be able to be fixed if I pop it off and adjust it? Not sure, not a gamer and taking keys off of keyboards is not something I normally do.Otherwise, a really beautiful and functional piece of office equipment and quite a bargain too!! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am so excited to use this for work!
reviews.reviewText: Delivery was faster than originally estimated which made it that much more exciting to receive. Directions and upkeep are easy to understand and small steps which I love lol. It has multiple functions and can be used for everyday typing or gaming. I wfh, so I will be using it everyday regularly. It was easy to set up. I literally unplugged my old keyboard and plugged this one in and immediately began using. No issues and no hassle to get started with it.The lights are bright and colorful, but again, they can be adjusted- by color and by brightness. The clicking sounds are soft-sounding, but for me, just enough clackity to get that productive and asmr feel going! The keys are a bit lifted which can take adjusting to if not used to higher up keys versus flat keys, but it's not a complaint- just to give an awareness.Definitely would recommend purchasing for self or gifting for another!

reviews.reviewTitle: Pretty great for the price, one of my favs
reviews.reviewText: So I just moved and I was looking for a new keyboard bc I couldn't keep my old one so I was looking for another one that was wired and not super expensive and I found this one. I was debating between a lot of them but I'm glad I decided on this one.It's def a more soft click and feels really nice to use, still getting used to it since I just started using it today but the colours are very nice and you can change the brightness, the breathing speed and have the lights off, on or breathing.Feels super nice to type on and just looks super nice, doesn't have the neon lights most keyboards due and I love the green and orange it has. Also its suuper light. Highly recommend it. (:

Bom, comprei o teclado branco e é meu primeiro dia com ele mas de cara já me surpreendi com a beleza do teclado, ele é bem delicado, bem fininho, muito mais bonito que nas fotos que vi aqui e o led sai de cada tecla, não estou acostumada com teclado e achei q o barulho iria me incomodar no comeco mas as teclas são muito confortaveis! Chegou antes do prazo e lindo demais! Do jeito que eu queria 🥰
The keyboard looks very nice, but is not great with a MAC and has a sticky "." key, which is very annoying when typing. Even when cleaning, issue remains.

reviews.reviewTitle: É LINDO, MAS NÃO É IGUAL A FOTO
reviews.reviewText: esperava um teclado branco/transparente e veio um prateado com preto.é lindo ainda, mas é diferente da foto. tirando isso, é muito bom e prático - não me arrependi.
